agent_configuration.name: SCG Contractor Payment Verification Agent
agent_configuration.description: Automated verification of construction contractor completion certificates and payment processing for SCG projects

steps.name: Document Ingestion
steps.description: Receive contractor completion certificate and supporting documents

steps.name: Thai OCR Processing
steps.description: Extract text from Thai construction documents
steps.error_handling: Escalate to manual OCR review if accuracy < 80%

steps.name: Thai to English Translation
steps.description: Translate construction terminology to English for processing
steps.error_handling: Flag for manual review if confidence < 90%

steps.name: Contract Compliance Check
steps.description: Verify work completion against contract specifications
steps.error_handling: Flag for contract manager review if compliance issues

steps.name: Quality Standards Verification
steps.description: Verify work meets SCG quality standards
steps.error_handling: Flag for quality manager review if standards not met

steps.name: Project Manager Approval
steps.description: Route to appropriate project manager for approval
steps.error_handling: Escalate if approval not obtained within 48 hours

steps.name: Contractor Payment Processing
steps.error_handling: Retry up to 3 times, then escalate to finance team

steps.name: Audit Trail Generation
steps.description: Create comprehensive audit trail for compliance
steps.error_handling: Ensure audit trail completeness before completion

decision_branches.action: THEN request resubmission with specific requirements

decision_branches.condition: IF work does not meet contract specifications
decision_branches.action: THEN flag for project manager review
decision_branches.escalation: Route to project manager with detailed compliance report

decision_branches.action: THEN generate rejection notice with reasons

decision_branches.escalation: Notify finance team for manual intervention

scg_project_management.purpose: Project status updates and contractor information
scg_project_management.data_flow: Bidirectional - read project details, update completion status

scg_contract_database.data_flow: Read-only - retrieve contract details for verification

scg_quality_management.data_flow: Read-only - retrieve quality standards for verification

scg_payment_system.data_flow: Write - initiate payments and update payment status

scg_audit_system.data_flow: Write - create audit records and compliance reports

document_processing_time.measurement: Average time from ingestion to approval decision

thai_ocr_accuracy.measurement: Text extraction accuracy on Thai construction documents

contract_compliance_rate.measurement: Percentage of submissions meeting contract requirements

payment_processing_speed.measurement: Time from approval to bank transfer completion

error_rate.measurement: Percentage of payments requiring manual intervention

success_criteria: Process Thai construction documents with 95%+ accuracy
Complete contractor payments within 24 hours of approval
Achieve 90%+ contractor satisfaction with payment speed

test_scenarios.name: Quality Standards Failure

test_scenarios.expected_outcome: QUALITY STANDARDS FAILURE - Route to Quality Manager

test_scenarios.name: High-Value Payment Routing
test_scenarios.description: Large payment requiring senior management approval
test_scenarios.expected_outcome: SENIOR APPROVAL REQUIRED - Route to Regional Manager

test_scenarios.name: Payment Processing Failure

test_scenarios.expected_outcome: PAYMENT PROCESSING FAILURE - Escalate to finance team

test_scenarios.description: Complex Thai construction terminology requiring manual review
test_scenarios.expected_outcome: MANUAL TRANSLATION REQUIRED - Flag for translation team
